basics.name: Numi Sveinsson Cepero
basics.label: Engineer, Applied AI and Data Scientist
basics.summary: A data scientist and engineer with a background in mechanical engineering and machine learning. I am passionate about using computation, data and modeling to solve real world problems and build products. I have experience in applied AI, graphics, scientific computing and modeling biomechanics. I am currently working on my PhD in biomechanical engineering at University of California, Berkeley.

work.name: Department of Mechanical Engineering, University of California, Berkeley
work.summary: Currently working on my PhD in biomechanical engineering at University of California, Berkeley. Working on developing automatic methods to contruct 3D models of human blood vessels from medical images. Also working on developing methods to simulate blood flow in the human body.

volunteer.position: Board of School of Engineering and Natural Sciences
volunteer.summary: Student representative on the board of School of Engineering and Natural Sciences at University of Iceland

education.institution: University of California, Berkeley, Berkeley, CA, USA

awards.title: Leif Eriksson Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded for academic excellence, leadership and community service. Used to fund my PhD studies at UC Berkeley.

awards.title: CV Presentation Award
awards.summary: Chosen to present my vascular modeling work at the conference.
